name: flare-smart-contracts-v2
description: Smart contracts implementing Top level protocol on Flare Network.
author: Flare SC team

scripts.test_unit_hh: env TEST_PATH=./test/unit yarn hardhat test --network hardhat
scripts.test_integration_hh: env TEST_PATH=./test/integration yarn hardhat test --network hardhat
scripts.coverage-forge: forge coverage --report lcov && node scripts/forge-lcov-prune.js && genhtml lcov.info.pruned --branch-coverage --output-dir coverage-forge
scripts.compile: yarn hardhat compile && yarn typechain-ethers-v6 && yarn typechain-truffle-v5 && yarn typechain-web3-v1
scripts.flatten-flare-sc: yarn flatten-dependencies node_modules/flare-smart-contracts scripts/flatten-files.txt flattened/FlareSmartContracts.sol scripts/flatten-extra-imports.txt
scripts.slither: pip3 install slither-analyzer && rm -f ./slither.json && rm -f ./slither_badge.json 2> /dev/null; slither . --json=./slither.json 2> /dev/null || true; node scripts/slither-parse.js ./slither.json
scripts.deploy_submission_contract_network_flare: env CHAIN_CONFIG=flare yarn --silent hardhat --network flare deploy-submission-contract > ./deployment/deploys/flare.json
scripts.deploy_submission_contract_network_costo: env CHAIN_CONFIG=coston2 yarn --silent hardhat --network coston2 deploy-submission-contract > ./deployment/deploys/coston2.json
scripts.deploy_submission_contract_network_songb: env CHAIN_CONFIG=songbird yarn --silent hardhat --network songbird deploy-submission-contract > ./deployment/deploys/songbird.json
scripts.deploy_submission_contract_network_costo: env CHAIN_CONFIG=coston yarn --silent hardhat --network coston deploy-submission-contract > ./deployment/deploys/coston.json
scripts.deploy_submission_contract_local_scdev: env CHAIN_CONFIG=scdev yarn --silent hardhat --network scdev deploy-submission-contract > ./deployment/deploys/scdev.json
scripts.deploy_submission_contract_local_hardhat: env CHAIN_CONFIG=scdev yarn --silent hardhat --network localhost deploy-submission-contract > ./deployment/deploys/scdev.json
scripts.deploy_contracts_network_flare: env CHAIN_CONFIG=flare yarn --silent hardhat --network flare deploy-contracts > ./deployment/deploys/flareTmp.json && mv ./deployment/deploys/flareTmp.json ./deployment/deploys/flare.json
scripts.deploy_contracts_network_coston2: env CHAIN_CONFIG=coston2 yarn --silent hardhat --network coston2 deploy-contracts > ./deployment/deploys/coston2Tmp.json && mv ./deployment/deploys/coston2Tmp.json ./deployment/deploys/coston2.json
